Camoflage::

She giggled and smiled at him. "WHo? Oh is that the bot who was 
outside with me? Uh, then, Yuppers I was. Is she ok? She seemed like 
she might be a nice bot. She was a big black wolf bot like you. Or so 
she looked like one covered in yucky stuff."
